ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="cf2f4c4b-3fb6-40f3-9ce6-fd5e49470b60" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Ingredient Usage w/ Cost and Type" Description="Ingredient usage with Cost grouped by Type" CreatedDT="2013-08-30T12:14:46.133" ModifiedDT="2015-03-26T09:24:28.477" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAdU9w=" ReportVersion="1" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText: <QueryBundle> <QueryText>select ReportDate = z.ReportDate ,InventoryItemName = ii.InventoryItemName ,IngredientTypeName = ity.IngredientTypeName ,CompanyName = c.CompanyName ,TotalCost = z.TotalCost ,TotalAF = dbo.GetMeasurementValue(z.TotalAF, c.MediumMeasurementType) ,TotalDM = dbo.GetMeasurementValue(z.TotalDM, c.MediumMeasurementType) ,TotalAFTon = dbo.GetMeasurementValue(z.TotalAF, c.LargeMeasurementType) ,TotalDMTon = dbo.GetMeasurementValue(z.TotalDM, c.LargeMeasurementType) ,WtdAvgTon = ISNULL(z.TotalCost / NULLIF(dbo.GetMeasurementValue(z.TotalAF, c.LargeMeasurementType), 0), 0) from ( select ii.InventoryItemGID ,ReportDate = CONVERT(date, it.TransactionDT) ,TotalAF = SUM(it.UnitQuantity) ,TotalDM = SUM(it.UnitQuantity * it.DMPct) ,TotalCost = SUM(it.FifoCost) from InventoryTransaction it join InventoryItem ii on ii.InventoryItemGID = it.InventoryItemGID join Ingredient i on i.InventoryItemGID = ii.InventoryItemGID -- used as a filter here ... where it.TransactionType = 8 group by ii.InventoryItemGID, CONVERT(date, it.TransactionDT) ) z join InventoryItem ii on ii.InventoryItemGID = z.InventoryItemGID join Ingredient i on i.InventoryItemGID = ii.InventoryItemGID join IngredientType ity on ity.IngredientTypeGID = i.IngredientTypeGID join Company c on c.CompanyGID = ii.CompanyGID where (1=1)</QueryText> <PreQueryText /> </QueryBundle>
